patthana14.3:1.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttaṁ
patthana14.3:1.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana14.3:1.1_2: paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:2.1_0: Hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuvippayuttaṁ
patthana14.3:2.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana14.3:2.1_2: paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.3:3.1_0: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati
patthana14.3:3.1_1: hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto
patthana14.3:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana14.3:3.1_3: nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.3:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
